title: DV8 Physical Theatre - The Cost of Living [2004]
description:
Movies : Short film : DVD Rip : English         35 mins 

Director - Lloyd Newson 

Based on the stage production conceived and directed by Lloyd Newson 

Commissioned by Channel 4 Television, UK 

Performers - Jose Maria Alves, Gabriel Castillo, Robin Dingemans, Tom Hodgson, Eddie Kay, Tanja Liedtke, Eddie Nixon, Kareena Oates, Rowan Thorpe, David Toole, Vivien Wood 

The Cost of Living was shot on location in Cromer on the Norfolk coast: a typical, old-fashioned and faded English seaside resort. The summer season has petered to an end. An air of desertion hangs over the town. Eddie and David are disillusioned street performers. Eddie is tough, confrontational and not afraid to defend his belief in justice, respect and honesty. David is a dancer who has no legs (as he is in real life), watching him makes you reconsider accepted notions of grace and perfection. He is quietly determined not to let his disabilities or society&#039;s prejudices get in his way. A series of inter-linked scenes show Eddie and David&#039;s encounters with other people; some are incredibly hard-hitting, others exhilarating because of their sheer physicality. 

DV8 Physical Theatre: http://www.dv8.co.uk/
